statements: DELETE FROM genetic_sequences WHERE gene_name = 'ABC' AND sequence_length > 1000;
DELETE FROM genetic_sequences WHERE organism_name = 'Homo sapiens';
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE sequence_id = 10 AND analysis_type = 'BLAST';
DELETE FROM sample_information WHERE sample_location = 'Lab A' AND patient_id = 5;
DELETE FROM TestResults WHERE patient_id = 100 AND test_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM GeneticVariants WHERE gene_id = 5 AND chromosome_number = 10;
